item.title: The -top- mustache extension in CFEngine 3
item.description: What is the -top- extension, and how do I use it in CFEngines Mustache templating method? The -top- extension to the mustache template method, first introduced in CFEngine 3.9.0, is a special key representing the complete data given to the templating engine. This is useful for iterating over the top level of a container {{#-top-}} ... {{/-top-}} and rendering json representation of data given with $ and %.
